about_the_game:
A unique and quirky adventure game where you play as a walking flower!
Your mission is to restore life to the forest by planting flowers to develop a vibrant and thriving ecosystem!

As you journey through the game, you will encounter a variety of obstacles and challenges that will test your gardening skills.
You'll need to navigate treacherous terrain, fend off pesky pests, and overcome environmental hazards in order to bring the forest back to life.

Whether you're a seasoned gardener or not, this short and cozy game is sure to offer a fun and engaging adventure for all players

So come join us in the weeds and help bring the beauty of nature back to life!

Features

Explore the forest by planting walkable grass, increasing your traversable area daily!

Complete your daily tasks before your energy runs out. Each night, you will replenish your energy by regrowing your flower for the next day.

Embark on exciting quests given to you by the unique characters you encounter on your journey.

Discover a charming and whimsical world filled with hidden mysteries and secrets to uncover as you explore.

Develop your gardening skills, dig holes, plant seeds, water plants and watch them bloom into beautiful flowers!

Uncover the interconnectedness and harmony of nature by understanding how all the different elements fit and work together.
